name: ZAuth
description: ZAuth empowers developers to allow users to bring their Identity & Activity on Internet via ZkProofs

content_security_policy.extension_pages: default-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' data:;connect-src 'self' data: https: filesystem: http: wss:;font-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' data:;script-src ;script-src-elem 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'wasm-unsafe-eval';
